node.name: Smart Watch MAKE: AMAZFIT MODEL: A2017
node.description: Smarter than other competitive smart watch under economical price range that has performance under worst condition like extreme cold area of Siberia, Russia. Built with latest technology, 6-axis accelerometer and pulse oximeter for 360 degree health check-up at home & without cost. (SIZE: 140x45x4mm / WEIGHT: 31 grams)
node.content: 1> With basic design at the outer and inside core which will not get outdated till 2030, gorilla 3 scratch-proof glass and 4 types of front screen visualization /2> Comfortable design to be wear by both male or female and show notifications for incoming calls, message and apps /3> Inbuilt 6-axis accelerometer which means this watch can even track the vertical speed i.e. LongJump athletes can monitor jump speed or flight speed so that they can upgrade their tactics /4> For heart patient specially design small scale oximeter is placed to regularly check the blood-oxygen-level /5> Features like mobile camera control for clicking solo pictures, PAI(Personal Activity Intelligence) health assessment system for unhealthy people are some additional points on which it has an advantage over other smartwatches, also battery life of 9 days.
node.alt: Amazfit Bip U Smart Watch, 1.43" HD Color Display, SpO2 & Stress Monitor, 60+ Sports Modes, Breathing Training, 50+ Watch Faces (Black)

node.name: Versa-2 Smart Watch MAKE: FITBIT MODEL: FB507BKBK
node.description: Nicknamed as "Alexa-Watch" while features really stand on the heights of digitalization in watch industry. This watch can alone control the entire digital or electronic world and can monitor user health like a personal physician. (SIZE: 227x50x4mm / WEIGHT: 40 grams)
node.content: 1> Premium class in smartwatch section that really competes on the basis of versatility which could be in numbers like voice command, fitness monitoring or either song storing /2> Like an "Amazon Alexa", this smartwatch can deliver current news and even information over voice command just user need to say "Alexa- What is the radius of Earth" /3> Monitor the health by matching the stressful times, calories consumption and also their effect on a daily basis /4> Unique built-in feature that tells the protein level of the body in hour basis /5> It can also store songs, provide notifications of calls, texts and emails /6> Very much easy to pair with an android device and battery life for 6 days which is equivalent to Indian working days.
node.alt: Fitbit FB507BKBK Versa 2 Health & Fitness Smartwatch with Heart Rate, Music, Alexa Built-in, Sleep & Swim Tracking, Black/Carbon, One Size (S & L Bands Included) (Black/Carbon)

node.name: Smart Watch MAKE: MI MODEL: XMSH10HM
node.description: Pretty much every smartwatch is water resistant these days but the point of difference comes, for the time long they remain same. This MI small master piece can remain waterproof up to 50 meter of depth and monitor the entire body like a portable ICU machine. (SIZE: 130x20x4mm / WEIGHT: 12 grams)
node.content: 1> Unisex design and size that can fit almost "DHAI-KILLO" hand, watch cum health monitoring device which can calculate heart rate, walking or running speed and personal activity /2> Accurate like the real manual devices, remain waterproof till the 50-meter depth of water and has a discharge life of 15 days which is equivalent to half month or too long journey /3> Anti-fungal and durable band which does not create any itching or allergic problem to hand, also chemical resisting coating over tempered glass and band makes it comfortable for Industrial workers as well /4> Uncomplicated to paired with any android or apple phone and easy digital readings which can be read by old people and teenagers.
node.alt: Mi Smart Band 5-1.1â€ AMOLED Color Display, 2 Weeks Battery Life, 5ATM Water Resistant

node.name: Inspire Smart Watch MAKE: FITBIT MODEL: FB412BYBY
node.description: Truly original in concept which can track calories consumption and alarming system that buzz without sound. Durable and long-lasting waterproofing for swimmers which can also detect the stroke count, unique in itself. Original in creativity with built in track system. (SIZE: 227x20x4mm / WEIGHT: 98 grams)
node.content: 1> Fitbit, an American brand that has a reputation to build the first smart watch in the world continued the legacy with the iconic and sober design of this all-purpose smart watch /2> Special calories consumption meter that works on the basic counts "How many calories one person needed to maintain his or her current weight" /3> Phrases said "Old is Gold" and luckily using the calorie meter of this smart watch many users confirmed the weight loss /4> Features like special type of irritating vibration alarm that can awake the person within a 10 seconds which is much more faster than sounding alarmed /5> My pick selection for swimmers because this smart watch can even count the strokes which is unique and never seen in any other smart watches /6> Mobile phone connectivity and showing notifications are basic but special feature in this watch is that users can mark the direction which is very helpful at complex localities where GPS literally failed to guide the direction, also the battery life of 6 days.
node.alt: Fitbit Inspire Health and Fitness Tracker (Sangria)
